articles.author: Sarah Collins
articles.title: ECB interest rate is heading towards 4pc by May and don't expect it to fall back soon - Independent.ie
articles.description: Interest rates could peak close to 4pc this summer and stay high for some time as the European Central Bank battles to tame prices.
articles.content: Interest rates could peak close to 4pc this summer and stay high for some time as the European Central Bank battles to tame prices.No, no, no, no, no, ECB president Christine Lagarde said when asked … [+4875 chars]

articles.author: Gabija Gataveckaite
articles.title: 'Outrage' in Europe after murder of Veronica Guerin, Dáil told - Independent.ie
articles.description: Europe was outraged after the murder of Sunday Independent journalist Veronica Guerin, President of the EU Parliament Roberta Metsola has told the Dáil and Seanad.
articles.content:
Europe was outraged after the murder of Sunday Independent journalist Veronica Guerin, President of the EU Parliament Roberta Metsola has told the Dáil and Seanad.
